input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item specifications below. You are an amazing copywriter so please write a fun product description.

Item specification:
FouFou Dog Rubber Dipped Socks

Item specifications:
Perfect for indoor or outdoor use
Protects paws from elements such as water, snow, dirt, salt, and hot pavements
Detachable hook and loop closure strap
Rubber dipped

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Protect your dog's paws from the elements with FouFou Dog Rubber Dipped Socks! Made from a comfortable cotton-poly blend, these socks are perfect for indoor or outdoor use. The rubber dipping provides extra grip and protection from water, snow, dirt, salt, and hot pavements. The detachable hook and loop closure strap ensures a secure fit, so your dog can walk and run with ease. These socks are machine washable for easy care. Available in 5 sizes, from Extra Small to Extra Large, there's a size for every dog. Order now and keep your dog's paws safe and healthy!
input_text.Response B: The FouFou Dog Rubber Dipped Socks are paw-fect for keeping your puppy's paws protected from the elements. These socks are made with a rubber-dipped material that protects your dog's paws from water, snow, dirt, salt, and hot pavements. They also come with detachable hook and loop closure straps that make them easy to put on and take off. Your dog will love running around in these stylish socks!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.feedback: Rubber dipped socks! I just wish I could insert a falling about laughing emoji in the comments.
